parameters.name: itemRef
parameters.shortdesc: page item to be added to article

parameters.name: at
parameters.shortdesc: The location relative to the reference object or within the containing object. (Optional)

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to value specifies before or after. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ArticleMember (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the ArticleMember.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the ArticleMember with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the ArticleMember with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the ArticleMembers within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The ArticleMember, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ArticleMember, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The ArticleMember, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ArticleMember, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first ArticleMember in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last ArticleMember in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle ArticleMember in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ArticleMember with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the ArticleMember that follows the desired ArticleMember.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ArticleMember whose index follows the specified ArticleMember in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The ArticleMember whose index comes before the desired ArticleMember.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any ArticleMember in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every ArticleMember in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ArticleMember.
Returns the ArticleMember with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
